case_title: United States of America v. Ishmael et al
case_info_full_case_name: United States of America v. Ishmael et al

charges.charge_description: 18:371 CONSPIRACY TO COMMIT OFFENSES AGAINST UNITED STATES(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft sentenced to custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 27 months, this consists of terms of 27 months on counts 1,2,3,4 and 5 to be served concurrently with one another; Supervised Release for 2 years; this consists of 2 years on each of counts 1,2,3,4 and 5 all such terms to run concurrently; Dft ordered to pay restitution in the amount of $115,751.32 which shall be due immediately; S/A fee $500.00 due immediately;

charges.charge_description: 18:658 INTENT TO DEFRAUD SECRETARY OF AGRICULTURE(2s-4s)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft sentenced to custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 27 months, this consists of terms of 27 months on counts 1,2,3,4 and 5 to be served concurrently with one another; Supervised Release for 2 years; this consists of 2 years on each of counts 1,2,3,4 and 5 all such terms to run concurrently; Dft ordered to pay restitution in the amount of $115,751.32 which shall be due immediately; S/A fee $500.00 due immediately;

charges.charge_description: 18:152(7) &; 18:2(a) CONCEALMENT OF ASSETS; AIDING AND ABETTING(5s)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft sentenced to custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 27 months; this consists of terms of 27 months on count 1 and 27 months on count 5 to be served concurrently with one another; Supervised Release for 2 years; this term consists of 2 years on each of counts 1 and 5 all such terms to run concurrently; Dft shall pay a fine in the amount of $5,000.00 which shall be due immediately; Dft ordered to pay restitution in the amount of $115,751.32 which shall be due immediately; S/A fee $200.00 due immediately;
